sentences.en: A method to evaluate performance cost of applications was Presented based on execution delay of benchmarking - sequence .
sentences.cn: 为评测应用程序的性能开销,提出 基序列 时延度量法.

sentences.en: Benchmarking the Chinese Corporate Law Department Against Law Departments of Foreign Multinationals.
sentences.cn: 中国跨国企业法务部与国外跨国公司法务部的比较.

sentences.en: If you do some benchmarking you will also see a nice performance increase.
sentences.cn: 如果你作一些性能测试,你也将看到可观的性能改善.

sentences.en: Marginal analysis is an important method for the generation of network benchmarking sequences.
sentences.cn: 边值分析是网络性能基准测试序列生成的一种重要方法.

sentences.en: Performance benchmarking and evaluation of different hardware, operating system and system configurations.
sentences.cn: 设定性能基准,评测不同的硬件 、 操作系统和系统配置.

sentences.en: The benchmarking was one of the three greatest management methods of 90's in 20 centuries.
sentences.cn: 标杆管理是20世纪90年代三大管理方法之一.

sentences.en: The Six Sigma Black Belt should be able to familiar with the basic principles of benchmarking.
sentences.cn: 六西格玛黑带应该熟悉标杆的基本原理.

sentences.en: The Six Sigma Black Belt should be familiar with the basic principles of benchmarking.
sentences.cn: 6西格玛黑带应熟悉标杆的基本原理.

sentences.en: The Six Sigma Black Belt should be familiar with the limitations of benchmarking.
sentences.cn: 六西格马黑带应该熟悉标杆的局限性.

sentences.en: This article introduces the content and the process of benchmarking in enterprises.
sentences.cn: 本文介绍了标杆管理的内容及标杆管理在企业中应用的具体过程.

sentences.en: This paper presents an improved benchmarking - based time performance measurement method for embedded operating systems.
sentences.cn: 提出了一种改进的基于基准程序的嵌入式操作系统的实时性能测量方法.

words.tran_cn: 标杆管理；标记；确定基准点

trans.tran_cn: 基准化分析法，标杆分析法（和业内最大竞争对手进行比较从而提高业绩的方法）
trans.tran_en: In business, benchmarking is a process in which a company compares its products and methods with those of the most successful companies in its field, in order to try to improve its own performance
